page.title: 15Farming
page.content: I visited a farm.At the farm we saw some cows and there were{12 cows}and there were{7 pigs}and there were{27 {calves}and there were no chickens and there were{3 horses}and the farm was {40 acres}and they{grow grass}.They have these machines{tractor,trailer, {grass cutter fertilizer spreader grass {topper ,bailer,tedder,and hay turner they{buy}farm things at{Salisbury mkt and they sell things too.{Catherine {Goodwin 8 }At the farm we saw some {cows}and there were{7}and I saw some {pigs}and there were{6 pigs.}We saw some{calves}and there were{12.}We saw {35 chickens.}There were{2 horses}.On Bob's farm he{only grew grass.}He has {no machines.}He{buys}and{sells}at {Salisbury}and{Ringwood.}His farm was {10 acres. Rebecca Barnett 8.}The horse fraterity are taking over fields. { }
